page.title: 13STEWARTBY MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: 1. There were four different years. You started in the ninth year then went into the tenth year and then eleventh and lastly twelfth. 2. Compared with Wootton Upper School there were not many teachers. 3. A uniform had to be worn. Both boys and girls had to wear a black blazer and a black and red tie. The uniform code was quite strict. 4. In the twelfth year, prefects were chosen as well as a head girl and boy, and a deputy head girl and boy. 5. We had an assembly every morning. 6. The lessons only lasted 35 minutes. 7. We had four different houses which were called Muskett, Stewart, Bunyan and Howard. 8. Sports day was held every year in July.
